# Task

Write a function `wrap_string`. It iterates over words and it will add a new line each time a maximum `text_width::Int=10` would be exceeded. Provide an example



# Data

wrap_string("This function will wrap words into lines")

```julia
function wrap_string(text, text_width=10)
    words = split(text)
    lines = []
    
    for word in words
        if length(lines[end]) + length(word) + 1 > text_width
            push!(lines, "")
        end
        push!(lines[end], word*" ")
    end
    
    return join(lines, "\n")
end

example_text = "This function will wrap words into lines"

wrapped_text = wrap_string(example_text)
println(wrapped_text)
```

The output of the code would be:

```
This function will wrap
words into lines
```
